rules: Rule1: Provided that soil is fertilized with nutrients, it follows that fields are irrigated with water or weather is monitored via forecasting.
Rule2: Either soil is fertilized with nutrients, or fields are weeded manually.
Rule3: If crops are treated with pesticide, then crops are not infected with disease.
Rule4: Either crops are treated with pesticide, or crops are isolated in quarantine.
Rule5: Provided that crops are isolated in quarantine, it follows that crops are not infected with disease.
Rule6: Either workers are hired seasonally, or workers are trained in skills.
Rule7: If workers are trained in skills, then produce is consumed on the farm.
Rule8: Whenever workers are retained for performance, it is not the case that workers are fired for misconduct.

Rule9: If the farm is managed efficiently, then under the condition that it is not the case that if workers are hired seasonally then produce is sold at the market, workers are retained for performance.
Rule10: Whenever equipment is invested in for maintenance, operations are expanded sustainably.
Rule11: Either equipment is invested in for maintenance, or processes are optimized through automation.
Rule12: Provided that processes are optimized through automation, the farm is managed efficiently.
Rule13: If yield is increased substantially, then the farm is managed efficiently.
Rule14: Whenever operations are expanded sustainably, products are diversified organically.
Rule15: If products are diversified organically, then yield is increased substantially.
Rule16: Provided that produce is sold at the market, it is not the case that grain is stored in the silo.
Rule17: If produce is consumed on the farm, then grain is not stored in the silo.
Rule18: Either produce is transported by truck, or produce is preserved in cold storage.
Rule19: If produce is preserved in cold storage, then produce is sold at the market or produce is consumed on the farm.
Rule20: Provided that weather is monitored via forecasting, then if produce is transported by truck, it must be that produce is sold at the market or produce is consumed on the farm.

Rule21: If it is not the case that if trees are pruned seasonally then under the condition that fields are weeded manually it must be that fields are irrigated with water or weather is monitored via forecasting, then crops are infected with disease.
Rule22: Whenever it is not the case that if workers are hired seasonally then produce is sold at the market, workers are fired for misconduct.
Rule23: If it is not the case that if produce is transported by truck then produce is sold at the market or produce is consumed on the farm, then produce is discarded in compost.

Rule24: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if crops are planted in the spring then the farm is profitable annually then crops are harvested in the fall, then grain is stored in the silo.
facts: Fact1: Crops are planted in the spring.
Fact3: It is not the case that fields are irrigated with water.
Fact4: It is not the case that crops are harvested in the fall.
Fact5: Produce is not discarded in compost.
